e1.name: The Higher You Fly, the Harder You Fall
e1.description: When the target enemy's current HP is greater than or equal to 50% of their Max HP, Dan Heng's CRIT Rate increases by 12%.

e2.name: Quell the Venom Octet, Quench the Vice O'Flame
e2.description: Reduces Talent cooldown by 1 turn.

e3.name: Seen and Unseen
e3.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

e4.name: Roaring Dragon and Soaring Sun
e4.description: When Dan Heng uses his Ultimate to defeat an enemy, his next action is Advanced Forward by 100%

e5.name: A Drop of Rain Feeds a Torrent
e5.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

e6.name: The Troubled Soul Lies in Wait
e6.description: The Slow state triggered by Skill reduces the enemy's SPD by an extra 8%.

e1.name: Memory of You
e1.description: Every time March 7th's Ultimate Freezes a target, she regenerates 6 Energy.

e2.name: Memory of It
e2.description: Upon entering battle, grants a Shield equal to 24% of March 7th's DEF plus 320 to the ally with the lowest HP percentage, lasting for 3 turn(s).

e3.name: Memory of Everything
e3.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

e4.name: Never Forfeit Again

e5.name: Never Forget Again

e6.name: Just Like This, Always...
e6.description: Allies under the protection of the Shield granted by the Skill restores HP equal to 4% of their Max HP plus 106 at the beginning of each turn.

e1.name: A Falling Star
e1.description: When enemies are defeated due to the Trailblazer's Ultimate, the Trailblazer additionally regenerates 10 Energy. This effect can only be triggered once per attack.

e2.name: An Unwilling Host
e2.description: Attacking an enemy with Physical Weakness restores the Trailblazer's HP equal to 5% of the Trailblazer's ATK.

e6.description: The Trailblazer's Talent is also triggered when they defeat an enemy.

e2.name: Convergence

e1.name: Legacy of Honor
e1.description: After Welt uses his Ultimate, his abilities are enhanced. The next 2 time(s) he uses his Basic ATK or Skill, deals additional DMG to the target equal to 50% of his Basic ATK's DMG multiplier or 80% of his Skill's DMG multiplier respectively.

e2.name: Conflux of Stars
e2.description: When his Talent is triggered, Welt regenerates 3 Energy.

e1.description: When HP is lowered than or equal to 50% of Max HP, increases Skill's DMG by 10%.

e4.name: Turn the Tables

e6.name: Shattering Shambles

Enemies suffering from Butterfly Flurry takes additional Quantum DMG equal to 15% of Seele's Ultimate DMG every time they are attacked. If the enemy is defeated by the Butterfly Flurry DMG triggered by other allies' attacks, Seele's Talent will not be triggered.

Each hit performed by the Lightning-Lord when it takes action will make the target enemy Vulnerable.
While Vulnerable, enemies receive 12% more DMG until the end of the Lightning-Lord's current turn, stacking up to 3 time(s).
